Test Name: PDGFB (22q13) Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization (FISH) assay
Purpose: To detect PDGFB gene rearrangement at chromosome 22q13 in patients with Dermatofibrosarcoma Protuberans or Giant Cell Fibroblastoma.
Container: FFPE tissue block or charged microscope slides with unstained sections
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope, hybridization oven, microtome, heat block, humidity chamber
